product_name: ILIASoft Focus Blurring Blush - Talc-Free Powder Blush
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackILIA Soft Focus Blurring Blush is a talc-free, non-comedogenic blush that blurs and smooths with buildable, featherweight color.
details: DetailsBenefitsBlurs pores + smooths skin textureBlurred, dimensional finish12-hour wearTalc-freeNon-comedogenicSafe for sensitive skinKey IngredientsSoft Focus Complex - Blurs and smooths with the perfect ratio of light-filtering powdersEdelweiss Extract - Multitasker that helps lift and smooth, making skin look more youthfulWinged Kelp Extract - Potent replenisher that restores hydration and supports firmer skinResearch Results94% said it blurs and smooths skin texture*94% said the color lasted all day**94% said their skin looked smoother and more refined after 28 days***In a clinical study of 52 people immediately ^* and after 28 days ^*. In a clinical study of 52 people and 12-hour instrumental test ^.Item 2642286How To UseDip the ILIA Precision Powder Brush into the compact and tap off any excess. Sweep onto cheeks in soft, circular motions. Apply in layers for more intense color payoff. Layer under or on top of Multi-Stick for multidimensional cheek color.IngredientsMica, Tapioca Starch, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lauroyl Lysine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Boron Nitride, Xanthan Gum, Tin Oxide, Leontopodium Alpinum Callus Culture Extract, Alaria Esculenta Extract, Tocopherol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): CI 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 17200 (Red 33 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), CI 16035 (Red 40 Lake), CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dip the ILIA Precision Powder Brush into the compact and tap off any excess. Sweep onto cheeks in soft, circular motions. Apply in layers for more intense color payoff. Layer under or on top of Multi-Stick for multidimensional cheek color.

reviews.headline: Beautiful color
reviews.comments: Really love the color and how long this blush lasts. I was a bit skeptical because I been using a cream for so long but this has really impressed me.

reviews.headline: Yes! A blurring easy to use cool tone muted mauve blush!
reviews.comments: At last, a color so perfect. I'm very fair, cool leaning neutral either way olive overtones. This is definitely cool toned and such a beautiful dusty mauve plum! I'm in love. Only using this now. Thank you.

reviews.headline: Beautiful blush, cheap packaging.
reviews.comments: I am obsessed with the shade in Glimpse. I only knocked off a star because for the price this blush costs you'd think they'd at least include a mirror and component itself would be a bit nicer. There are more luxury brands in a similar price range with superior packaging. But the actual formula is to die for so I will be purchasing more shades.

reviews.headline: Why add glitter??
reviews.comments: No one seems to have mentioned how GLITTERY this blush is. Its really disappointing because the colors are pretty and the formula is buttery soft, but the disco ball glitter flakes ruin the effect. So unnecessary and unnatural. Bummer.

reviews.headline: The glitter!! Why!!
reviews.comments: I havent seen anyone mention this, but this blush has the most awful cheap chunky glitter. Its heartbreaking because the colors and blending are beautiful, it melts into the skin. But the stupid glitter ruins it all! Nothing about glitter flakes is natural. So disappointed

reviews.headline: Pretty blush, but very expensive
reviews.comments: Breathless is a gorgeous shade, but the packaging looks and feels cheap… for the price, I'd at least expect a mirror in the compact. Considering returning.

media.headline: This blush is its own statement
A must have for daily use!
Great color, can see it but looks natural
An Excellent Addition To Any Routine
I would love to try more shades
The Blush That Makes Me Look Well-Rested

Natural Color and Easy to Apply
Best blush I have ever used!!!! I LOVE it!!!!

faceoff_positive.comments: After recently discovering and using Ilia Soft Focus Blurring Blush in the shade Sensation, I found the blush to be extremely impressive and exceptional. The blush arrived in a nice-sized, round, designed compact that's visually appealing. The shade Sensation is a beautiful, rich, bright pink tone. This talc-free powder applies effortlessly and blends in seamlessly with my makeup, as well as on my fresh, bare skin, while looking natural. While applying, I use a brush to apply in circles, and it feels lightweight and comfortable on my skin. The shade is buildable and lasts all day without fading or looking cakey and works extremely well at hiding all my skin's imperfections. It doesn't settle into fine lines or cling to dry patches, and it stays put surprisingly well throughout the day. It's also versatile and can be worn as a highlighter since it has lots of shimmer. While I have sensitive skin, I appreciate that this powder is non-comedogenic and doesn't clog my pores and cause my skin to break out. At the end of the day, it's easy to remove. I really love the fact that it's cruelty-free, vegan, and has a clean ingredients list, as I love animals with all my heart. The only improvements would be to include a mirror and a brush in this compact. I highly recommend others try this high-quality blush, as I doubt you'll be disappointed. I received this product in exchange for an honest review.
faceoff_positive.headline: Beautiful, Exceptional Blush!

faceoff_negative.comments: I havent seen anyone mention this, but this blush has the most awful cheap chunky glitter. Its heartbreaking because the colors and blending are beautiful, it melts into the skin. But the stupid glitter ruins it all! Nothing about glitter flakes is natural. So disappointed
